ygData.subject: [Q] advancing fighting skills at higher levels
ygData.msgSnippet: I have a 9th level wizard that has been using 2H blunt for her entire life.  I would like to try some 1H weapons to free a hand for useful items in the future
ygData.messageBody:
I have a 9th level wizard that has been using 2H blunt for her entire
life. I would like to try some 1H weapons to free a hand for useful
items in the future so I went to the newbie area and started wacking
/con green critters. I found I could hit several run to a un
populated area and then stand and punch one creature until it ran
away. Then started working another until it ran away eventually
comming back to the original one. I did this with one group of 3
crits for over an hour and got absolutely 0 increase in bare hand
skill (still at 10 or 11)!

What is going on am I to start on /con blue creatures at level 9. If
so and had I known (ie if the manual had any value at all) I would
have been training 1H skills much early when the creatures could not
kill me in 2 or 3 blows!

Can anyone confirm this and/or give suggestions on how at this point
(9th) I can improve my 1H fighting skills?
